welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Remich, the charming city known for its beautiful vineyards and picturesque views! We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all the hidden gems this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Findel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Findel Airport, primarily used for budget airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bitburg Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bitburg Air Base Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
